Benefits

In melee combat, if an opponent attacks and misses the character, the character may immediately make a free Disarm or Trip attack against them, at a -4 attack penalty. This attack does not provoke an AoO.
system.summary: If opponent misses in melee, -4 to-hit Disarm or Trip attempt in response.
